Posts.Content: Apr 21, 2013 10:55PM hv1954 wrote: I'm new to the club, and a first-time poster. I had surgery on April 1 (R mastectomy), am stage IIIA with 4 positive lymph nodes. I am scheduled to start chemo on Thurs Apr 25. Meeting with oncologist tomorrow - does that mean this is my "chemo class?" Still haven't settled on a regimen -- choices are AC x 4 + Taxol X 4 every two weeks, AC x 4 + Taxotere x4 every 3 weeks, CT every 3 weeks, or ACT (my onco says if I do this, she "won't want me out of her sight.") Will know much more tomorrow. Options are mind-boggling and are costing me some sleep.
Posts.Title: April 2013 Chemo Group BeHereNow 6cats
